textEnglish: For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
textLatin: Sic enim Deus dilexit mundum, ut Filium suum unigenitum daret : ut omnis qui credit in eum, non pereat, sed habeat vitam æternam.

textEnglish: For I delight in God's law after the inward man,
textLatin: condelector enim legi Dei secundum interiorem hominem :

textEnglish: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
textLatin: In principio creavit Deus cælum et terram.

textEnglish: Jesus said to him, 'I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father, except through me.'
textLatin: Dicit ei Jesus : Ego sum via, et veritas, et vita. Nemo venit ad Patrem, nisi per me.

textEnglish: Even so, let your light shine before men; that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father who is in heaven.
textLatin: Sic luceat lux vestra coram hominibus : ut videant opera vestra bona, et glorificent Patrem vestrum, qui in cælis est.
